channel.title: Chinese recruit almost kills himself and instructor with grenade
channel.description:
http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/21134540/vp/36130363#36130363
wow... maybe this is why they should stick to stabbing people in the temple
I saw this in a movie once, "In the army now". Except he dropped the grenade and threw the pin.

item.title: Chinese recruit almost kills himself and instructor with grenade
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Is it just me or does it look like it goes completely sideways of the direction he’s standing? Both him and the instructor are looking towards the camera, but it looks as if the grenade goes completely to their right.

Read full topic
